title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not update immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the label's font size to '18 points'.

Expected behavior: When modifying the label's font size, the label's height should adjust accordingly and justify with the font size.

Observed behavior: Currently, the label's height does not change when modifying the font size.
